casebody.data:
MONTROSE CHEMICAL CORPORATION OF CALIFORNIA
v.
S.C (CANADIAN UNIVERSAL INSURANCE COMPANY) S244737 Supreme Court of California NOVEMBER 29, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

Petition for review granted. The requests for judicial notice are granted. Chin and Corrigan, JJ., were recused and did not participate.
